## PR Checklist

- [x] Addresses an existing open issue: fixes #5126
- [x] That issue was marked as [`status: accepting prs`](https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22status%3A+accepting+prs%22)
- [x] Steps in [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) were taken

## Overview

Work in progress draft branch to keep #5042 cleaner and more focused

## Remaining

* [x] Doc scripts
* [x] Node based tests
* [x] Coverage
* [x] Remove: https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/blob/9692b3ae2cc98e228c01a47a2ef8f22f6c59c7a9/.github/DEVELOPMENT.md?plain=1#L20

:shipit: this looks wonderful, thank you!

It's hard to review such a sweeping PR - but everything works on my end.

Related: https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/issues/5159

I would suggest moving the `version` scripts to GitHub Actions along with that.
Waiting for #5177 before I continue on this one, as they overlap
